'''Spreading Evil''' is a repeatable basic daily [[commission]] in Teyvat.

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|An [[Abyss Mage]] was seen performing a ritual on the [[hilichurls]]. Defeat them to put an end to this threat.}}
#Defeat all enemies (0/X)
